basics.name: Mauricio Lopez
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Software Developer with a proven track record of working with clients on delivering solutions to challenging business problems. Consistently delivers innovative technology with diverse teams.

work.description: Application Architect for att.com UI applications including homepage, sales, ordering and order management.

Lead solution, architecture and delivery team delivering operations support tools for identification and resolution of system issues. This React based application in conjunction with a general query micro service enables a user to securly query any application database with configurable queries enabling realtime analysis of application data.

Lead technical, system and security architecture for AT&T Business Device Management Platform (DMP). AT&T DMP provides customer self service for enrollment and management of devices. Web application built on Angular and micro services. Event based data synchronization between billing systems and device management platform. Integration between AT&T and partner OEMs including Apple, Google and Samsung.
Lead technical, system and security architecture for AT&T Business Device Management Platform (DMP).
Lead design and development of AT&T Engage. AT&T Engage provided personalized video and audio generation to enhance online support and sales.

Lead design and development of AT&T TDICE. Developed content management for T.Data a predictive analytics personalized recommendation engine. Designed a distributed Micro Service interface exposing a synchronous interface from IBM Streams.
